myopenmath.statement:
A coffee distributor plans to mix some Gualtemala Antigua coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${9.70} per pound with some Tanzanian coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${12.20} per pound to create \displaystyle{70} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${10.24} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound. pounds of Gualtemala Antigua coffee. pounds of Tanzanian coffee.
